question:
Which of the following statements are correct regarding Advance Informed Agreement under Cartagena Protocol on Biosafety?
1. Under this agreement a country which wants to export a LMO for intentional release into the environment must notify in writing the Party of import before the first proposed export takes place.
2. The Party of import must acknowledge receipt of the notification within 90 days and it must also communicate its
decision on whether or not to import the LMO within 270 days.
Select the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation:
As per Advance Informed Agreement under Cartagena Protocol on Biosafety  a country which wants to export a LMO for intentional release into the environment must notify in writing the Party of import before the first proposed export takes place. The Party of import must acknowledge receipt of the notification within 90 days and it must also communicate its
decision on whether or not to import the LMO within 270 days.
